channel.title: Help! (Reward)!
channel.description:
Every source + client my friend is using it does this error when trying to log in.
"No response from server Please try using a diffrent world."
We have tried over 4 server + client.
Before it let us log in just fine on any client + server.
If you are able to help us we are offering 5m rsgp and/or mod in-game
Reply or add me on skype.
Austin-Liang
Thank you.

item.title: Help! (Reward)!
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

nvm… it’s something on his account… so he just made another window’s account

Fixed

Close this please

Read full topic

[quote=“yesimanub, post:6, topic:447672”]we have tried all that…
it doesnt work…
his old partner did something
and we cant find out what…
we tried 5 clients… -.-[/quote]

Oh, i knlw what it is but you didnt even rep me

item.title: Help! (Reward)!
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:4, topic:447672”][quote author=PvPXile link=topic=550564.msg4035242#msg4035242 date=1341150354]

Tell him to re install java.

Idiot ^
Right mate firstly you’re going to need a host, i’d sugguest no-ip, go to no-ip.com download the duc and sign up and create a host. Once that is done, client sided, go to

Client>java>client.java

hit ctrl+f and search for server =

Replace what comes next with your host ip you just created.

Then you will need to portforward. To do so, go to your routers homepage, go to virtual servers and open a port named RSPS, selecting both of the nect options ,the port you will need to open is 43594 or 5555

Im sure i elped you, if you need anything else feel free to pm me. I dont want yuor rsgp, just a rep++ please.
[/quote]
He’s not asking how to host it dumbfuck[/quote]

You lil cunt, its offline. to put it online he needs to host i.

Read full topic
